Darts App

Lets play darts!

After discovering my passion for web development, I couldn't get enough. I made websites for friends and family, and hired myself out as a freelancer. I'm looking forward to bringing that passion to a full-time role

I enjoy solving problems and taking on difficult tasks. An innate curiosity always pushes me to learn new things. I am excited to pursue a career as a frontend developer.
